details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.6 Actions - 6.6.1 General - Action types
details.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData, Hide, Rendition and Trans actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and no-op actions shall not be permitted. The SetOCGState and GoTo3DView actions shall only be permitted in a PDF/A-4e compliant file as described in Annex B.

rule.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData, Hide, Rendition and Trans actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and no-op actions shall not be permitted. The SetOCGState and GoTo3DView actions shall only be permitted in a PDF/A-4e compliant file as described in Annex B.
rule.test: S == "GoTo" || S == "GoToR" || S == "GoToE" || S == "Thread" || S == "URI" || S == "Named" || S == "SubmitForm" || S == "SetOCGState" || S == "GoTo3DView" || S == "JavaScript" || S == "RichMediaExecute" || S == "GoToDp"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type
